sen.j: 津田丑五郎（つだ うしごろう、弘化2年（1845年） - 明治2年5月11日 (旧暦)（1869年6月20日））は、山城国京都出身の新選組隊士。
sen.e: Ushigoro Tsuda (1845 - Oct 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Kyoto, Yamashiro Province.
Ushigoro TSUDA (1845 - Oct 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Kyoto, Yamashiro Province.
sen.cmt: Tsuda を大文字に変更しました。
sen.e: Ushigoro TSUDA (1845 - October 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Kyoto, Yamashiro Province.

sen.j: 戊辰戦争に参戦し、その功績により歩兵から士官に取り立てられたと言う。
sen.e: He fought in the Boshin War and it is said that he made a great achievement and was promoted from a foot soldier to an officer.
He fought in the Boshin War and it is said that he made a great achievement and was promoted from a foot soldier to an officer.
He fought in the Boshin War and it is said that he made a great achievement and was promoted from a foot soldier to an officer.

sen.j: 土方歳三らと共に蝦夷地へ渡り、箱館戦争に参戦。
sen.e: He went to Ezo with Toshizo HIJIKATA and fought in the Hakodate War.
He went to Ezo with Toshizo HIJIKATA and fought in the Hakodate War.
He went to Ezo with Toshizo HIJIKATA and fought in the Hakodate War.

sen.j: 明治2年5月2日、新政府軍本営（七重浜）夜襲に出動して負傷、箱館総攻撃により弁天台場で戦死した。
sen.e: He was injured when he turned out to the night attack of the headquarters of the New government army on June 11, 1869, and was killed at Benten Daiba in the all-out assault of Hakodate.
He was injured when he turned out to the night attack of the headquarters of the new government army on June 11, 1869, and was killed at Benten Daiba in the all-out assault of Hakodate.
sen.cmt: New を new に変更しました。
sen.e: He was injured when he turned out to the night attack of the headquarters of the new government army on June 11, 1869, and was killed at Benten Daiba in the all-out assault of Hakodate.
